sameAnalysis.word_list: laugh, smile, giggle, grin, beam, sneer
means: laugh ： 最常用词，指因喜悦、愉快或轻视而出声的笑或大笑。
smile ： 指面露微笑，侧重于无声。
giggle ： 指发出咯咯的笑声，较多地用于女人或孩子。
beam ： 书面用词，指人因心情舒畅而发出的笑，即喜形于色地笑。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"嘲笑"之意。
means: ridicule ： 多指有意地用言语对戏弄某人，以使之显得渺小，不重要。此种嘲笑善意恶意均可。
mock ： 指一种挖苦的，带挑衅性的嘲笑。
scoff ： 指对一般受到尊重的事物的嘲笑。
sneer ： 指除了用讽刺言语讥笑外还带轻蔑的表情。

sentence.Network_en: Canete's mouth twisted in a contemptuous sneer.
sentence.Network_cn: 卡内特傲慢而轻蔑地撇了撇嘴。

sentence.Network_en: Oh, is it? … said the sheriff with a sneer.
sentence.Network_cn: “噢, 是 吗 ?”司法官冷笑着说.
他的话中带有嘲笑之意.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语发音_百度文库 ... fear 害怕 sneer 冷笑练习七 tour 旅游、观光.
短篇英语寓言故事_英语小故事_VOA英语网 ... 2. sprout v. 发芽，抽条 3. sneer v. 嘲笑，讥笑 4. degenerate a. 退化的，变性的.
短篇英语寓言故事_英语小故事_VOA英语网 ... 2. sprout v. 发芽，抽条 3. sneer v. 嘲笑，讥笑 4. degenerate a. 退化的，变性的.
英语怎样自学?_爱问知识人 ... seer 预言家, 先知 sneer 嘲笑, 讥讽(的表情) startle 惊吓, 使吃惊\\a惊人的.

list.abs: However , there are still some people who sneer at it ., 但是仍然有少数人对其不屑一顾.
when they have no one to trample on and sneer at , the truth is revealed , the ugliness in them arises .当他们无人可以踩踏和嘲笑的时候，真相就显而易见了，他们内在的丑陋就会暴露。
The peers queer peering is a sheer sneer ., 贵族奇怪的窥视是一次完全的嘲笑.
It is very discouraging to be sneered at all the time ., 总被人嘲笑是很让人灰心的.
We can just dispose of such slander with a sneer ., 对这种诬蔑我们只好一笑置之.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: probably of imitative origin

entry.def: If you sneer at someone or something, you express your contempt for them by the expression on your face or by what you say.

example.ex: There is too great a readiness to sneer at anything the Opposition does...
example.tran: 对反对党的任何举动都想加以嘲笑的心理过于急切了。

example.ex: If you go to a club and you don't look right, you're sneered at...
example.tran: 如果你去夜总会却穿得不合时宜，人家会笑你的。

means.word_mean: 1. a facial expression of contempt or scorn; the upper lip curls

sentences.sentence: "she sneered at her little sister's efforts to play the song on the piano"

auth_sentence.content: This second sneer procured another laugh against him.
auth_sentence.res_content: This second sneer procured another laugh against him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This second sneer procured another laugh against him.

auth_sentence.content: Of course, Manchester City supporters and others will sneer.
auth_sentence.res_content: Of course, Manchester City supporters and others will sneer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Of course, Manchester City supporters and others will sneer.

auth_sentence.content: So you can't sneer at bishops for being lofty and removed.
auth_sentence.res_content: So you can't sneer at bishops for being lofty and removed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So you can't sneer at bishops for being lofty and removed.

sentences.en: You many sneer, but a lot of people like this kind of music.
sentences.cn: 你可以嗤之以鼻, 但很多人喜欢这种音乐。
他的话中带有嘲笑之意。

jushi.english: I felt that every woman here sneered at me.
jushi.chinese: 我感到这里的每一个女人都在嘲笑我。

jushi.english: You may sneer,but a lot of people like this kind of music.
jushi.chinese: 你可以嗤之以鼻，但很多人喜欢这种音乐。
